item.title: PI help desperately needed
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

[quote=“ravens, post:8, topic:406821”] public void bandosTalk(){ for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c.lastTalk = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTalk >= 1500000) { random = Misc.random(30); { if (random == 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Death to our enemies!"); } else if (random == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Brargh!"); } else if (random == 20) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Break their bones!"); } else if (random == 17) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("For the glory of Bandos!"); } else if (random == 12) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Split their skulls!"); } else if (random == 29) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("We feast on the bones of our enemies tonight!"); } else if (random == 25) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("CHAAARGE!"); } else if (random == 22) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Crush them underfoot!"); } else if (random == 19) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("All glory to Bandos!"); } else if (random == 10) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("GRAAAAAAAAAR!"); } else if (random == 18) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("FOR THE GLORY OF THE BIG HIGH WAR GOD!"); } } } } } }

if (npcs[i].npcType == 6260){ bandosTalk(); } [/quote]

still getting errors

Read full topic

public void bandosTalk(){ for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c.lastTalk = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTalk >= 1500000) { random = Misc.random(30); { if (random == 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Death to our enemies!"); } else if (random == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Brargh!"); } else if (random == 20) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Break their bones!"); } else if (random == 17) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("For the glory of Bandos!"); } else if (random == 12) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Split their skulls!"); } else if (random == 29) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("We feast on the bones of our enemies tonight!"); } else if (random == 25) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("CHAAARGE!"); } else if (random == 22) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Crush them underfoot!"); } else if (random == 19) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("All glory to Bandos!"); } else if (random == 10) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("GRAAAAAAAAAR!"); } else if (random == 18) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("FOR THE GLORY OF THE BIG HIGH WAR GOD!"); } } } } } }

if (npcs[i].npcType == 6260){ bandosTalk(); }

item.title: PI help desperately needed
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

[quote=“ravens, post:4, topic:406821”]hmmmm i would try adding some imports?
or make a method like this

public void bandosTalk(int NPCID){

actually try this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 6260) c.lastTalk = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTalk >= 1500000) { random = Misc.random(30); { if (random == 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Death to our enemies!"); } else if (random == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Brargh!"); } else if (random == 20) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Break their bones!"); } else if (random == 17) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("For the glory of Bandos!"); } else if (random == 12) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Split their skulls!"); } else if (random == 29) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("We feast on the bones of our enemies tonight!"); } else if (random == 25) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("CHAAARGE!"); } else if (random == 22) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Crush them underfoot!"); } else if (random == 19) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("All glory to Bandos!"); } else if (random == 10) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("GRAAAAAAAAAR!"); } else if (random == 18) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("FOR THE GLORY OF THE BIG HIGH WAR GOD!"); } } } [/quote]
do you mean like this?

public void bandosTalk(int NPCID){ if (npcs[i].npcType == 6260) long lastTalk = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTalk >= 1500000) { random = Misc.random(30); { if (random == 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Death to our enemies!"); } else if (random == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Brargh!"); } else if (random == 20) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Break their bones!"); } else if (random == 17) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("For the glory of Bandos!"); } else if (random == 12) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Split their skulls!"); } else if (random == 29) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("We feast on the bones of our enemies tonight!"); } else if (random == 25) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("CHAAARGE!"); } else if (random == 22) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Crush them underfoot!"); } else if (random == 19) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("All glory to Bandos!"); } else if (random == 10) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("GRAAAAAAAAAR!"); } else if (random == 18) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("FOR THE GLORY OF THE BIG HIGH WAR GOD!"); } } } }

if so thats 8 errors

item.title: PI help desperately needed
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

hmmmm i would try adding some imports?
or make a method like this

public void bandosTalk(int NPCID){

actually try this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 6260)
c.lastTalk = System.currentTimeMillis();
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTalk >= 1500000) {
      random = Misc.random(30); {
      if (random == 3) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("Death to our enemies!");
      } else if (random == 5) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("Brargh!");
      } else if (random == 20) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("Break their bones!");
      } else if (random == 17) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("For the glory of Bandos!");
      } else if (random == 12) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("Split their skulls!");
      } else if (random == 29) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("We feast on the bones of our enemies tonight!");
      } else if (random == 25) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("CHAAARGE!");
      } else if (random == 22) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("Crush them underfoot!");
      } else if (random == 19) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("All glory to Bandos!");
      } else if (random == 10) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("GRAAAAAAAAAR!");
      } else if (random == 18) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].forceChat("FOR THE GLORY OF THE BIG HIGH WAR GOD!");
      }
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: PI help desperately needed
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

my goal is to make bandos randomly talk like in runescape, i currently have:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 6260) random = Misc.random(30); { if (random == 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Death to our enemies!"); } else if (random == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Brargh!"); } else if (random == 20) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Break their bones!"); } else if (random == 17) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("For the glory of Bandos!"); } else if (random == 12) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Split their skulls!"); } else if (random == 29) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("We feast on the bones of our enemies tonight!"); } else if (random == 25) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("CHAAARGE!"); } else if (random == 22) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Crush them underfoot!"); } else if (random == 19) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("All glory to Bandos!"); } else if (random == 10) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("GRAAAAAAAAAR!"); } else if (random == 18) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("FOR THE GLORY OF THE BIG HIGH WAR GOD!"); } }
when i compile there is no errors, but when you log in every npc spams those, how can i make it so its random, not spammed, and only said by graardor?

Read full topic
